name: Neucom
startIntroPart1: Neucom Incorporated. We aim to provide the software that shapes the world of tomorrow.
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: We have the technology, money and diplomacy to end this.
attacked: You will not be invited for the world of tomorrow!
defeated: Very well, we'll se what NUN has to say about this.
introduction: We at Neucom Incorporated are excited to begin our talks with you. Let's hope you can help us shape the world of tomorrow.
hateHello: What do we need to do to you again?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: We hope we don't need to fight anymore.
